mapper.select: -- 既存アカウントチェック SELECT MA_CACCOUNT FROM MAST_ACCOUNT WHERE MA_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND MA_CACCOUNT = #{account} AND MA_CUSERID <> #{userId} AND MA_DSTART <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND MA_DEND >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) UNION SELECT MA_CACCOUNT FROM MAST_ACCOUNT WHERE MA_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND MA_CACCOUNT = #{account} AND MA_CUSERID <> #{userId} AND MA_DSTART > TRUNC(SYSDATE)
